scripts.start: npm run lint && npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/index.js dotenv_config_path=.environment/prod.env
scripts.start:dev: ./node_modules/.bin/nodemon -e js,env,html -w .environment --watch src/ --exec "npm run lint && npm run build && node -r dotenv/config" dist/ dotenv_config_path=.environment/dev.env
scripts.start:local: ./node_modules/.bin/nodemon -e js,env,html -w .environment --watch src/ --exec "npm run lint && npm run build && node -r dotenv/config" dist/ dotenv_config_path=.environment/local.env
scripts.push: git push && git push heroku master
